span.span: Represents a value tuple with 2 components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值元組是具有特定的數字和值序列的資料結構。A value tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 結構代表具有兩個元素的值元組。The structure represents a value tuple that has two elements. 值元組類型不同的 tuple 型別 (例如)，如下所示：The value tuple types differ from the tuple types (such as ) as follows: - 它們是結構 （實值類型），而不是類別 （參考型別）。They are structures (value types) rather than classes (reference types). - 這類成員和是欄位，而不是屬性。Members such as and are fields rather than properties. - 其欄位是可變動而非唯讀狀態。Their fields are mutable rather than read-only. 值元組類型提供支援的執行階段實作[tuple C# ](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md)中的結構元組和F#。The value tuple types provide the runtime implementation that supports [tuples in C#](~/docs/csharp/tuples.md) and struct tuples in F#. 除了建立執行個體所使用的語言語法，您可以呼叫factory 方法。In addition to creating a instance by using language syntax, you can call the factory method. ### 序列化和值的 tupleSerialization and value tuples 類型不是可序列化的.NET Core 1.x 或在.NET Framework 4.7 和舊版本。The type is not serializable in .NET Core 1.x or in the .NET Framework 4.7 and earlier versions. 此外，.NET Standard，包括.NET Standard 2.0，不會要求您提供的序列化執行個體; 是否是可序列化的執行個體取決於個別的.NET Standard 實作。In addition, .NET Standard, including .NET Standard 2.0, does not mandate serialization of instances; whether or not a instance is serializable depends on the individual .NET Standard implementation. 若要判斷是否型別是可序列化特定的.NET 實作上，會取得物件，表示類型及擷取的值及其屬性。To determine whether a type is serializable on a particular .NET implementation, get a object that represents the type and retrieve the value of its property. 如需可序列化的型別在.NET Core 和.NET Framework 中的清單，請參閱 < [ 二進位序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。For a list of serializable types in .NET Core and the .NET Framework, see [Binary Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`引數會被視為等於目前的執行個體，在下列情況下：The `obj` argument is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是實值型別。It is a value type. - 其元件會與目前執行個體相同的類型。Its components are of the same types as those of the current instance. - 其元件會等於目前的執行個體。Its components are equal to those of the current instance. 每個元件的預設相等比較子來判斷相等。Equality is determined by the default equality comparer for each component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的字串形式 (*Item1*， *Item2*，其中*Item1*並*Item2*代表的值和欄位。The string returned by this method takes the form (*Item1*, *Item2*, where *Item1* and *Item2* represent the values of the and fields. 如果任何一個欄位的值是`null`，表示為。If any of the field values is `null`, it is represented as .
